Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class xsens::SharedDataPointer< T >

A template class that contains reference counted data with copy-on-write semantics.

The SharedDataPointer class implements implicit sharing and is inspired on QSharedDataPointer. The contained type T should inherit from SharedData and should implement at least a basic constructor and either a copy constructor or a function that allows it to clone itself. In the latter case, a specialized clone() function should be written for the SharedDataPointer class.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
void xsens::SharedDataPointer< T >::detach ( )
inline

Prepare the object for editing.

This function makes sure that the reference count is 1 so that we can safely edit the stored object. If the reference count is higher than 1, a deep copy is made. Otherwise the function simply returns.
